briefTitle: Effect of Tadalafil Once a Day in Men With Erectile Dysfunction
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Tadalafil (LY450190) Once a Day in Subjects With Erectile Dysfunction Who Are Naïve to PDE5 Inhibitors
summary: The primary aim of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of tadalafil 5 mg administered once a day in patients with erectile dysfunction (ED) who are naïve to PDE5 (phosphodiesterase type 5) inhibitors. Patients may be dose reduced to 2.5mg based on tolerability.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the International Index of Erectile Function - Erectile Function Domain (IIEF-EF) at Week 12
